Package hac.ex4.repo

Interface ProductRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Product,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Product,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Product,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Product>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Product,Long>
public interface ProductRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Product,Long>
Product repository to access the product database.

  • Method Details

    • findTopDiscounts

      @Query("select p from Product p where p.discount > 0 order by p.discount DESC") List<Product> findTopDiscounts()
      Finds discounted items ordered by highest discount to lowest.
      Returns:
      List of products with discount, ordered by discount in descent.

    • findByNameContains

      List<Product> findByNameContains(String name)
      Find products by name substring.
      Parameters:
      name - Name to search by.
      Returns:
      List of products matching that name.

    • decreaseQuantityById

      @Transactional @Modifying @Query("update Product p set p.quantity = p.quantity - ?1 where p.id = ?2 and p.quantity >= ?1") int decreaseQuantityById(Integer quantity, long id)
      Decreases quantity of product by id, if the new quantity isn't 0.
      Parameters:
      quantity - Quantity to reduce product's by.
      id - id to find product.
      Returns:
      Number of products updated, 1 if update was successful (at most 1 matches id), 0 otherwise.
